name: Riff For Your Life
description:
Riff For Your Life - A Survival-Horror-Rhythm-Game Made in 72 hours for Ludem Dare 41.

Fight off supernatural evil with the power of ROCK!

Use the left, right and down arrow keys - hit the keys in time with the music to kill enemies and keep moving. 

Made by Deadwave Games

Code - James Kapella - @Culturebosh

Sound - Edward Swain
